section.heading: Contracting authority.
section.text: The Mayor may contract with qualified carriers to provide health benefits under the laws of the District for periods of time to be determined by the Mayor. Any contract under this section shall be in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 3 of Title 2.

annotations.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 1987, D.C. Law 7-27, § 2(d), 34 DCR 5079
This section is referenced in § 1-621.03 and § 1-621.12.
